variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: py-beautifulsoup4
dependencies.description:
Beautiful Soup is a Python library for pulling data out of HTML and XML
files. It works with your favorite parser to provide idiomatic ways of
navigating, searching, and modifying the parse tree.

dependencies.name: py-bleach
dependencies.description: An easy whitelist-based HTML-sanitizing tool.

dependencies.name: py-defusedxml
dependencies.description: defusing XML bombs and other exploits

dependencies.name: py-entrypoints
dependencies.description: Discover and load entry points from installed packages.

dependencies.name: py-hatchling
dependencies.description: Modern, extensible Python build backend.

dependencies.name: py-importlib-metadata
dependencies.description: Read metadata from Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-jinja2
dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.

dependencies.name: py-jupyter-core
dependencies.description: Core Jupyter functionality

dependencies.name: py-jupyterlab-pygments
dependencies.description: Pygments theme using JupyterLab CSS variables.

dependencies.name: py-lxml
dependencies.description:
lxml is the most feature-rich and easy-to-use library for processing XML
and HTML in the Python language.

dependencies.name: py-markupsafe
dependencies.description:
MarkupSafe is a library for Python that implements a unicode string that
is aware of HTML escaping rules and can be used to implement automatic
string escaping. It is used by Jinja 2, the Mako templating engine, the
Pylons web framework and many more.

dependencies.name: py-mistune
dependencies.description: A sane Markdown parser with useful plugins and renderers.

dependencies.name: py-nbclient
dependencies.description:
A client library for executing notebooks. Formally nbconvert's
ExecutePreprocessor.

dependencies.name: py-nbformat
dependencies.description: The Jupyter Notebook format

dependencies.name: py-packaging
dependencies.description: Core utilities for Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pandocfilters
dependencies.description: A python module for writing pandoc filters

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pygments
dependencies.description: Pygments is a syntax highlighting package written in Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-testpath
dependencies.description:
Testpath is a collection of utilities for Python code working with files
and commands.

dependencies.name: py-tinycss2
dependencies.description:
tinycss2 is a low-level CSS parser and generator written in Python: it
can parse strings, return objects representing tokens and blocks, and
generate CSS strings corresponding to these objects.

dependencies.name: py-tornado
dependencies.description: Tornado is a Python web framework and asynchronous networking library.

dependencies.name: py-traitlets
dependencies.description: Traitlets Python config system

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment

dependent_to.name: py-jupyter
dependent_to.description: Jupyter metapackage. Install all the Jupyter components in one go.

dependent_to.name: py-jupyter-server
dependent_to.description:
The Jupyter Server provides the backend (i.e. the core services, APIs,
and REST endpoints) for Jupyter web applications like Jupyter notebook,
JupyterLab, and Voila.

dependent_to.name: py-nbsphinx
dependent_to.description:
nbsphinx is a Sphinx extension that provides a source parser for *.ipynb
files.

dependent_to.name: py-nbclassic
dependent_to.description: Jupyter Notebook as a Jupyter Server Extension.

dependent_to.name: spectre
dependent_to.description:
The SpECTRE numerical relativity code. SpECTRE is an open-source code
for multi-scale, multi-physics problems in astrophysics and
gravitational physics. In the future, we hope that it can be applied to
problems across discipline boundaries in fluid dynamics, geoscience,
plasma physics, nuclear physics, and engineering. It runs at petascale
and is designed for future exascale computers. SpECTRE is being
developed in support of our collaborative Simulating eXtreme Spacetimes
(SXS) research program into the multi-messenger astrophysics of neutron
star mergers, core-collapse supernovae, and gamma-ray bursts.

dependent_to.name: py-kb-python
dependent_to.description: Python wrapper around kallisto | bustools for scRNA-seq analysis.
